paper_abstract: A large proportion of the Western population doesn't meet the guidelines of being moderately to vigorously active for at least 30 minutes five days a week. Here, the authors present a mobile system that goes beyond existing (mobile) physical activity interventions. Combining theory and evidence-based behavior-change techniques with a model-based reasoning system provides the right support and strategies at the right time for obtaining a physically active lifestyle.
paper_title: Encouraging Physical Activity via a Personalized Mobile System
